title: [Bug]: Teams is opening links with non-default browser
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

When clicking a link from a chat, Teams is launch Google Chrome instead of my default browser, Firefox.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.3

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. In your OS settings, switch your default browser to Firefox
2. In Teams, click on a link in one of your conversations
3. Teams will launch Google Chrome
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Teams should open links in the default browser
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
I should note that in Settings -> 'Files and Links' there is no option to set the browser default either. I have read other posts about there being an option under "Files and Links".  But the only option I see is "Always open Word, Powerpoint, Excel files in:"

This behavior does not exist in the web browser verison. 

Additional info:
Linux rhowelllx 6.8.0-52-generic #53-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sat Jan 11 00:06:25 UTC 2025 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS
```

### Additional context

_No response_
